thread.title: Computer Repair Shop

title: Computer Repair Shop
text: Business Summary 600Sq Ft with waiting room. Busy Computer repair shop in Hudson FL is selling to relocate in another state. (home town) In business since 2012 with over 900 clients. We are strictly repair, we do not have any stock of new items. Store generates about 3-4k a month with under 1k overhead. You will get everything we have here, tools, used stock(good) Desks (3), Chairs, Couch, Air compressor, Full size refrigerator, Computer, Customer list... EVERYTHING you will need to just take over. Also a very nice website, Facebook and google plus page, we are ranked #1 in google search for ''computer repair'' or ''computer repair hudson fl'' Check us out! Call 727-857-5984 between 8am - 3pm Mon - Fri. Financials
